name: [Jam] SlapR
description:
Hey!

SlapR has been made for the Ludum Dare 38, which is the second time I participate to this game jam!

If you want to know more about it, please visit the page of the game here!

Controls:

- Keyboard:

  • Move -> Arrows
  • Slap -> Left-click

- Controller:

  • Move -> Left stick
  • Slap -> A button (for Xbox360 controllers, might be square button for PS4 controllers)
